main.name: Jackie (Hodges) Pederson
main.description: Full-stack web developer and innovative problem-solver who is passionate about developing apps and continuous learning of new technologies. Strengths in communication, collaboration, and building projects from ideation to execution. Please feel free to look around this portfolio site and reach out
main.bio: With my engineering degree and on-going software development training, I enjoy solving problems with innovative solutions in technology. While I have refined my soft-skills through working collaboratively at my current job, I have recently acquired technical skills through the completition of the Coding Boot Camp through University of Texas - Austin. I have enjoyed learning software development techniques, and I am looking forward to applying them in a more direct way as I begin my career in the tech industry.
main.contactmessage: You can connect with me through these ways;

work.company: Trinity Operating - Subsidiary of NextEra Energy
work.title: Environmental Specialist
work.description: Managed environmental due diligence associated with over 2,000 upstream wells prior to acquisition. Coordinated remediation efforts to ensure that environmental releases were delineated, remediated, and closed out with the necessary governmental entities within specified time frames and budgets ranging from $10,000 to $5MM. Assisted in building out software solution -- Maximo and OneEx -- to assist with tracking and closing out of submitted work orders. Coordinated with various internal business units to advise about environmental risks associated with various stages of projects.
